descriptionHTML:
Do you like being on vacation? Do you like beautiful islands, beaches, and the ocean?

Then this live wallpaper and watch face is for you! (Android wear watch face included).

We introduce our new live wallpaper for Android – KM Beach Live Wallpaper (free)
Now you can enjoy fantastic beaches and islands.
Made entirely from plasticine.
______________________________________
Live wallpaper and Android wear watch face features (Free version shows ads):
Objects in the ocean, on the little island, and in the sky:
★ Crab on the beach
★ Turtle on the beach
★ Dolphin
★ Shark
★ Beautiful island;
★ Beautiful beach;
★ Seagull

You can interact with the objects:
★ You can touch the crab, and it will run away.
★ You can also touch the turtle, the shark, and the clouds.

Sky settings:
★ Clouds
★ Sun
______________________________________
Be sure to install this beautiful "KM Beach Live wallpaper Free" on your phone or tablet. For Android 4.X or higher;
______________________________________
Like this Live wallpaper on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KMBeachLiveWallpaperHD
Like this Live wallpaper on Google+: https://plus.google.com/115001876720976935238
______________________________________
